resources.string: The aim is to see how well you and a friend know each other. You each need to be running this game on your own Android device. You will be asked a series of questions, with multi-choice answers. Guess what your friend will say, then give your own answer - the one you think is the best description of you. When you have both answered, the game will tell you if you guessed correctly.

Alternatively, you can play on a single device. Supply your name and the name of the other player below, then click "Play On One Device". When you are both playing on a single device, supply your answer, then hand the device to the other player: the title-bar should indicate who needs to supply an answer.
You were wrong! You thought {} would choose:
Your combined score was {0}%. {1}. If you want to play again, click on \'Next Quiz\'

string-array.name: howDoneStrings
string-array.item: Well done! You both know each other amazingly well
Good! You both know each other very well
Not bad! You\'re getting to know each other
You\'ve still got a some catching up to do

resources.string: How well do you know me?
